mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue (id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address) VALUES (#{clue.id}, #{clue.fullname}, #{clue.appellation}, #{clue.owner}, #{clue.company}, #{clue.job}, #{clue.email}, #{clue.phone}, #{clue.website}, #{clue.mphone}, #{clue.state}, #{clue.source}, #{clue.createBy}, #{clue.createTime}, #{clue.editBy}, #{clue.editTime}, #{clue.description}, #{clue.contactSummary}, #{clue.nextContactTime}, #{clue.address})
mapper.select: /* 利用pageHelper进行查询时不能在末尾加分号 */ select tc.id, tc.fullname, tc.appellation, tu.name as owner, tc.company, tc.job, tc.email, tc.phone, tc.website, tc.mphone, tc.state, tc.source, tc.createBy, tc.createTime, tc.editBy, tc.editTime, tc.description, tc.contactSummary, tc.nextContactTime, tc.address from tbl_clue tc inner join tbl_user tu on tc.owner = tu.id order by createTime desc

select c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, u1.name as owner, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone, c.state, c.source, u2.name as createBy, c.createTime, u3.name as editBy, c.editTime, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address from tbl_clue c inner join tbl_user u1 on c.owner = u1.id inner join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = c.createBy left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = c.editBy where c.id = #{id};

select car.id as id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on a.id = car.activityId inner join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where car.clueId = #{clueId};
